answers.answer: Feet can start swelling at any point of pregnancy if you are retaining water. Drink more water, and elevate your feet. Try not to stay in one position too long. And be aware that swelling can also be a sign of preeclampsia, if it is excessive, or your hands and face join in the party.
Also I find it helpful sometimes to lay on my back with my bum against the wall and my feet leaning up against the wall.
Mine never have. I'm 37 weeks. My fingers did tho. I think it just depends on the person.
I'm 31+4, and have no swelling my feet, just a Lil bit in my fingers
